configuration.title: Self-Check
configuration.stem: Complete the rubric to self-assess your performance.

options.name: mc-opt-item-028151441155932844
options.text: I listed all factors (genetic, reproductive, and environmental) that limit the number of whitebark pines in Yellowstone.

options.name: mc-opt-item-06761015402153134x1
options.text: I researched how environmental scientists help threatened populations.

options.name: _widget_-06746030267015473
options.text: I used a model to consider genetic solutions that could help the whitebark pines.

options.name: _widget_-06373867074329345
options.text: My solutions are based on research and a correct understanding of the pines' pattern of growth and reproduction.

options.name: _widget_-06794159357381242
options.text: My presentation used effective scientific argumentation to defend the Eco-Task Force proposal.
